channel.title: Members on DILab
channel.description: Recent content in Members on DILab

item.title: Dayiheng Liu
item.description: My name is Dayiheng Liu (刘大一恒). I’m a Ph.D. student in the College of Computer Science at Sichuan University, advised by Prof. Jiancheng Lv. My CV can be found here. My publications can be found here. My awards & honors can be found here. (More about me…) Experience 2019.6 - 2020.7, Intern, NLC group, Microsoft Research Lab – Asia (MSRA). Team leader: Nan Duan Mentor: Yeyun Gong 2015.

item.title: Kexin Yang
item.description: Kexin Yang is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science for machine intelligence. She received the B.B.M degree in Business School, Hohai University, Nanjing, China, in 2017. Her research interests include neural language generation and applications.

item.title: Qian Qu
item.description: Qian Qu is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science for machine intelligence. She received the B.E. degree in College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China, in 2017. Her research interests include neural language generation and social data analysis.

item.title: Mingfeng Xue
item.description: Pursuing the Ph.D. degree. Natural Language Generation. Dream of retirement.

item.title: Chanjuan Li
item.description: My name is Chanjuan Li (李婵娟). I’m a master student in the College of Computer Science at Sichuan University, advised by Prof. Jiancheng Lv. My publications can be found here. My awards & honors can be found here. (More about me…) My CV can be found here. My publications can be found here. My awards & honors can be found here. (More about me…) Experience 2019.9 - 2022.7, Master, DICALab, Sichuan University (SCU).

item.title: Huishuang Tian
item.description: Huishuang Tian is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. She received the B.E. degree in College of Software Engineering, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China, in 2019. Her research interests include NLP.

item.title: Cheng Luo
item.description: Cheng Luo is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. A senior embedded development engineer switched to AI. Her research interests include NLP and DL.

item.title: Jian Lan
item.description: Jian Lan is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. He received the B.E. degree in College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China, in 2020. His research interests include Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning.

item.title: Hang Zhang
item.description: Hang Zhang is currently pursuing a Ph.D. degree in Computer Science for machine intelligence. He received the B.E. degree in College of Software Engineering, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China, in 2019. His research interests include NLP, NLG and deep learning.

item.title: Yifan Pu
item.description: Yifan Pu is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. He received the B.E. degree in College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Sichuan, China, in 2018. His research interests include Natural Language Processing and Deep Learning.

item.title: Yusen Liu
item.description: Yusen Liu is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. He received the B.E. degree in College of Software Engineering, Tianjin University, Tianjin, China, in 2018. His research interests include NLP and DL.

item.title: Liao Chen
item.description: Liao chen is currently pursuing the M.Sc. degree from College of Computer Science, Sichuan University, Chengdu, China. Major in NLG.
